description:
Change of use of County Court (Sui Generis) to educational accommodation (D1). Installation of roof top ventilation and cooling plant along with external alterations. (Removal of two external steel fire escapes on front elevation, removal of basement and ground floor level hoist, removal of 1930's front entrance and platform area, installation of two new entrance doors to rear elevation, installation of new roof glazing with opening rooflights, and refurbishment of sash windows)
Removal of internal structural walls and partitions, installation of new lift, escape stair, mezzanine level and services associated with conversion to a school. (Listed Building Application P061613 also submitted)
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The design and installation of new items of fixed plant on the roof and within the basement shall be such that, when operating, the cumulative noise level LAeq Tr arising from plant, measured or predicted at 1m from the facade of the nearest noise sensitive premises, shall be a rating level of 5dB(A) below the background noise level LAF90 Tbg. The measurement and/or prediction of the noise should be carried out in line with BS 4142: 1997.

REASON: To ensure that the amenity of the locality is not prejudiced in accordance with Policy ENV 17 of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002.
